titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideas of a National Child Care Worthy Wage Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
4/29/2008--Introduced.
States that Congress supports the goals and ideas of National Child Care Worthy Wage Day, and urges public officials and the general public to honor early childhood care and education staff and programs in their communities, and to work together to resolve the early childhood care and education staff compensation crisis.
